Last Updated: November 25, 2025

 MemoroX Notes (“the App,” “we,” or “our”) respects your privacy. By using the App, you agree to the following:

 1. No Personal Data Collection

 • We do not collect, store, or share any personal information.
 • No sign-up, login, or personal profile is required.
 • No third-party tracking is used.

 2. Local Note Storage

 • All notes are stored only on your device.
 • We cannot access your notes.
 • Your notes remain private and under your control.

 3. Permissions

 • The App may request basic permissions only for app functionality (e.g., saving and editing notes).
 • Permissions are not used to collect personal data.

 4. No Ads or Monetization

 • The App does not show ads.
 • Your data is never shared with third parties.

 5. Children’s Privacy

 • The App is safe for all ages.
 • Since no personal data is collected, child privacy is protected.

 6. Data Security

 • You are responsible for protecting notes on your device (lock screen or backup recommended).

 7. Changes to Policy

 • We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
 • Updates will include a new “Last Updated” date.

 8. Contact

 Email: petshall.com@gmail.com
